name: Spooky Duel
description:
An auto battler dice game. 

  • Destroy the AI's heart before it destroys yours
  • Units attack the closest unit in the row opposite them. If the row opposite them in empty, they attack the Heart
  • Each turn you get to roll four dice, but can only use three. You can move dice from one dice tray to another to get more units or abilities.
  • Attack order explanation didn't make it into the game. The attack order is determined by default health:
    Knights > Templars > Priests > Thieves > Archers > Magicians

Made in 50 hours by 2 people for the GMTK2022 Jam.
